title: i want to add rp to my account in west but i live in USA...
body: can i buy a prepaid card from here and riot change it to europe card by sending them my code or just sending my code and just add those rp to my account?

replies.body:
We may be able to help if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our billing specialists can work with you. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
